hints.content:
When multiplying by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the left.

Number | Ten Thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: 
$3{,}140$| |$\swarrow\maroonD{3}$ | $\swarrow\blueD{1}$ | $\swarrow\greenD{4}$ | $\swarrow\purpleD{0}$  
$10 \times 3{,}140$ | $?$ | $?$ |$?$ | $?$ | $?$

Number | Ten Thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: 
$3{,}140$| |$\swarrow\maroonD{3}$ | $\swarrow\blueD{1}$ | $\swarrow\greenD{4}$ | $\swarrow\purpleD{0}$  
$10 \times 3{,}140$ | $\maroonD{3}$ | $\blueD{1}$ |$\greenD{4}$ | $\purpleD{0}$ | $0$
